starvationevasion.client.Networking

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientTest, DeprecatedClient

    public interface Client
    This interface is primarily to allow multiple versions of Client to be implemented without causing issues with registering them with the GUI. A class that implements Client is not required to be thread-safe. This is left up to individual implementations to decide if it's necessary or not.

      Tries to draft the given card (interfaces with server).

      Returns the chat manager maintained by this client.

      Gets the hand maintained by this client at the present time.

    • Method Detail

      • getRegion

        EnumRegion getRegion()
        Gets the region associated with this client.
        Returns:
        region

      • getHand

        java.util.ArrayList<EnumPolicy> getHand()
        Gets the hand maintained by this client at the present time.
        Returns:
        array list containing hand data.

      • getChatManager

        ChatManager getChatManager()
        Returns the chat manager maintained by this client. A chat manager should interface with this client's communication module behind the scenes.
        Returns:
        valid chat manager

      • getCommunicationModule

        Communication getCommunicationModule()
        Gets the communication module.
        Returns:
        communication module

      • getState

        State getState()
        This should return a valid state for this client (as received from server).
        Returns:
        last-valid state sent to the client

      • getVotingCards

        java.util.ArrayList<GameCard> getVotingCards()
        Gets a list of policy cards that this client currently has.
        Returns:
        list of policy cards

      • getGui

        GUI getGui()
        Gets the GUI object that was registered with this client.
        Returns:
        gui

      • setGUI

        void setGUI(GUI gui)
        Sets the GUI for this client.
        Parameters:
        gui - valid gui reference

      • loginToServer

        boolean loginToServer(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      EnumRegion region)
        This should send a request to the server to login. The return statement only reflects whether the statement was sent or not, rather than whether the login was successful.
        Parameters:
        username - username to use
        password - password to try
        region - region for the user
        Returns:
        true if the request was sent and false if the send failed

      • createUser

        boolean createUser(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   EnumRegion region)
        Attempts to register a new account with the server.
        Parameters:
        username - username to create
        password - password to associate
        region - region tied to this user
        Returns:
        true if the request was sent and false if the send failed

      • voteUp

        boolean voteUp(GameCard card)
        Asks the client to vote the given card up.
        Parameters:
        card - card to vote up
        Returns:
        true if the vote up request was sent and false if the send failed

      • voteDown

        boolean voteDown(GameCard card)
        Asks the client to vote the given card down.
        Parameters:
        card - card to vote down
        Returns:
        true if the vote up request was sent and false if the send failed

      • ready

        boolean ready()
        Tells the client to send a ready request.
        Returns:
        true if the ready request was sent and false if the send failed

      • done

        boolean done()
        Tells the client to send a done request to the server so it can move forward.
        Returns:
        true if the done request was sent and false if the send failed

      • draftCard

        boolean draftCard(GameCard card)
        Tries to draft the given card (interfaces with server).
        Parameters:
        card - card to draft
        Returns:
        true if the draft request was sent and false if the send failed

      • discardCard

        boolean discardCard(GameCard card)
        Tries to discard the given card (interfaces with server).
        Parameters:
        card - card to discard
        Returns:
        true if the discard request was sent and false if the send failed

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Checks to see if the client is still running. This might return false if something like the server disconnected.
        Returns:
        true if running and false if not

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shuts down the client. It is not meant to be used at all after this is called.

      • update

        void update(double deltaSeconds)
        When called, this should perform all necessary updates to keep the client up to date with the current state of the game. This function should only ever be called from one thread.
        Parameters:
        deltaSeconds - change in seconds since the last time this function was called
